Content:: Arabella is an Italian comedy film in the English language, starring Virna Lisi, Terry-Thomas and James Fox. It was directed by Mauro Bolognini.[1] The film is a comic farce set in Italy, playing off the interaction between English and Italian stereotypes.[citation needed]  This article related to an Italian comedy film of the 1960s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
